turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: You're full of shit, Vince! You're so full of shit you're going to float away!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: You, Vince! You! You are! You're a crock! You're a walking, talking crock!... I mean, what do you know?

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: I'm tellin' you she does it, Vince! With twenty guys you know!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Then what's the gun for! What's this for?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: In case!!! The gun's in case!!!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: In case???!!! In case of what? In case you stumble on her, suckin' cock in the front fucking hall?!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: She might!!! She might do it, Albert, but you can't fuckin' tell me that she does!!!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: She does, Vince! That's what I'm telling you! She does!!!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Albert! For Christ's sake... John! Wait a minute, you guys!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You gotta hit it here. Here, Albert, not there.

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Where should I hit it? Just show me where I should hit it.

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: I love this car. Some cars sit, you know? This car, a car like this... grows. I mean you never know, with a car like this, where this car has been.

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Hey, Nick! God damn!... What've you been doin', I mean...

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Look who's talkin'! Jes'! He got married! Vince got married!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: He's serious. Vince is fuckin' serious!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Worse since she talked to who?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Well, where the hell is he!!! I mean what are we all sitting here for!!!  WHAT THE HELL IS THIS???

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Nick! Nick, you'll kill him!... Easy. Nick, easy! Hey, hey. Vince goes back a long way.

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: I'm glad. Seriously... I'm very glad.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Angela, I just heard Sal was alive.

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: Nick, he's fine. He's in a hospital and they're fixing him up.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: What hospital is he in? Where?

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: Nick... Sal is very weak. He suffered a severe wound... and right now he doesn't want a whole lot of people to get involved in a whole thing.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Hey, Angela, Sal and I go back a long way.

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: He doesn't want people bugging him, Nick!

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: Did you ever think life would turn out like this?

turns.speaker: ANGELA
turns.text: You know what Sal's got now?... Sal's got... one arm, Nick, and... that's it.

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: Ah yes. Of course.  To the girl who waits.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Yeah... Do you mind if I sit?

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: But of course! Please make yourself comfortable. Perhaps you would enjoy some fresh caviar, or une petite glace, or --?

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: Unfortunately I must now go in, but I leave you my card. Naturellement I pay my players cash American. Just so you know.

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: C'est tres amusant... You have been promoted. And to a Jew... I am joking of course. Naturellement. Seriously, Nick, may I hope that you have come to play?

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: Ah. Merle. And you know Merle?

turns.speaker: ARMAND
turns.text: Merle is under his tree... Beside the terrace. You can't miss him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I love Linda, see. I love Linda more than I can even say.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: That's right. That's exactly what I mean!

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: I love Linda. Myself, I love Linda so much!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Only,good people love Linda, see. What Linda has, Linda --

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: How you like to have nice fuck with Linda? You like that? Special, crazy fuck just like with Linda?

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: I show you. Come. You come.  Linda have special, crazy fuck. That right?

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: You like to call me Linda now?

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: You call me Linda, just like home.

turns.speaker: BAR GIRL
turns.text: Wait! First I give you special fuck!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Elephants! Make way... I gotta get elephants!

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Those fuckin' niggers. This time I'm going to eat balls!... You ever try 'em?

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Not bad fresh, but they don't keep worth a pig's fart.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Boy, do I love this conflict. Huh?... What the hell were you doin' in there?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You know a guy named Merle?

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Merle? That's who we're looking for. Merle.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Sure! I got eight hundred potatoes says he goes one more... He retired, you know.

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Shhh! Albert's gonna hump the Coup de Ville.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Look at that, see... Watch. Wait a minute, watch. There! D'j'u see that? D'j'u see the way he... You know what that guy is doing? That guy is squeezing her ass!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Oh well! What do you mean Oh well?! The guy is actually... He did it again! That's what he's doing... He... He's reaching in, John, to her --! I'll kill him! I'm gonna kill him right now.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Merle, hey Merle, you got any socks?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Take last night...! Last night he coulda had twenty fuckin' deer! More! He coulda had more! And look what he does! I mean look what he fuckin' does!!!

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Nick, we don't know where Sal is... Nick, Angela won't tell us.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: 'Course how could you miss, right? Twenty, maybe thirty feet. I mean, if I'd'a been where you guys were --

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Nick! Hey, Nick!  Boy! Boy oh boy! Are you okay? You're okay, huh?

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Sit down. Here. Right here.  Albert! Vince!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Rough.  We didn't have to do it, John.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: No. How's Angela? How's she taking it?

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Worse since she talked to him.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Why?... What do you mean?... Why???

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: But Sal's mother! What about Sal's mother!

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: She's out of her tree, Nick. She is straight out of her tree.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I got you on this flight, Biederman. Is that right?

turns.speaker: LIEUTENANT
turns.text: Please! Please mister, please! This is vital I go to Saigon. This is very important. Most important.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Listen, Biederman, I'm going to club you into the floor unless you tell me what the fuck is so important.

turns.speaker: LIEUTENANT
turns.text: That I must not tell you. Top secret. You see there. Topmost secret.

turns.speaker: LIEUTENANT
turns.text: I will not betray my country. No. Ne-ver!

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Hi.  Nick, your shoes are soaking.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I was just wondering... Nick... You're going hunting... If I could use this place to stay, because...

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I'd want to pay you... and I was thinking --

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I would want to pay you, Nick... and I was thinking --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I don't know what we've been waiting for!

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I don't know! I don't know either!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sit with Linda, man, will ya?... Give her a beer.  Would you like a beer?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: What kind of beer would you like?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Give her Miller's. Miller's High Life.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I thought... Oh, Nick, I thought you were hurt, some accident. Maybe you fell or maybe some car...  I thought someone stole you away!

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Oh, Nick! Oh I missed you so!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Fine. I'm fine. How are you?

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Fine. I just go along, you know. Down at the market. Back here. I mean it just seems there's a million things to do!... Are you sure you're all right? I mean, what about the wound?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: That was nothing. That wasn't anything.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It was just the complications. I mean, you take a little thing over there and then you get complications. I mean all the guys had it.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I made you a sweater.  Here... You have to take that off.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Great. Fine... Once or twice it did fall off the blocks. I don't know what that's from.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Is that what it is? I couldn't figure out.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Did you get hurt? You didn't get hurt?

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Oh, no. It just kind of goes thump. Would you like a Coke? You don't drink Coke. Or maybe you do. What about champagne? Let's have champagne! I don't think we have champagne. Let's have this. See? Sparkling. I'll get you an opener. Oh, that's right. No opener. Let's just have beer. Do you want some cheese? Or maybe eggs? Maybe we should have coffee.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Nick?... I just want to say how sorry I am about Sal and about Merle. How... I know you loved them and I know it's not the same. I mean now.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Maybe... I don't know, if you want to talk --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Naw, it's... This guy wants his money.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Does this... I mean, how does this job work out?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I'll kill 'em. Anybody bothers you, I'll kill 'em!

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Nick. It's okay... It's okay.  I have to go now.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Yeah... All the guys, we're all going huntin'. Like we did. You know? Like we always used to.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: That's wonderful. I think you should... fresh air.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Hey. Look. There must be something.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: I'll be out... Just leave me. I'll be out. I'm fine. Really. I'm fine.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I... No. You do this for money?

turns.speaker: MAN
turns.text: Mais certainment... A great deal of money. Naturally I do not do it myself. I myself do not possess the nerve.  But I am always... how do you say... looking out for those who do... It is a thing quite rare. Champagne perhaps? Tch, tch. Don't say no. When a man says no to champagne, he says no to life and that no man must ever do.  Where did you play?

turns.speaker: MAN
turns.text: Ah yes. Of course... So few survive.  La creme de la creme... How did you obtain release?

turns.speaker: MAN
turns.text: How extremely clever. That is really most extraordinaire... Allow me please to introduce myself. I am Armand... And you are?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Sal... listen to me, Sal! You have to do it.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: I want to go home, Merle.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: You have to think about this, Sal. Listen to me, Sal! You have to think about this.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Listen to me, Sal. If you don't do it they'll put you in the pit. If they put you in the pit, Sal, you're gonna die... Sal, do you understand?

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Where are we going, Merle? Are we going home?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Sal!  Sal... Goddamn it, Sal, don't you know anything?

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Where are we going, Merle? Are we going home?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Sure. Sure, Sal. We're going home.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Humper's ready. Old humper's hotter'n damn hell!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Won't we? Right? Am I right?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: You should have put that on last night.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I just wait. For this... It's what I wait for... I wait all year.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: So do I.  I want to be ready... You have to be ready... It has to be there, in your mind.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I don't think about the shot that much.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: You have to think about the shot. It's the shot. The shot's it.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I don't know... I guess I think about the deer... Being out, maybe. I don't know. I think about it all. Hell, I like the trees, you know? I like the ways the trees are, all the different ways the trees are too.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I'll tell you something, Nick. I wouldn't hunt with anyone but you. I won't hunt with a yo-yo.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Who's a yo-yo...? Who do you think's a yo-yo! They're all yo yo's. I mean they're all great guys, for Christ's sake, but... The point is, Nick, without you I'd hunt alone. Seriously. I would. That's what I'd do.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You're a fucking nut. You know that, Merle? You're a fucking maniac!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Yeah.  When it comes to hunting, that's true.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Fucking A. See that ribbon in the left. That's Quan Son. That fucking guy was at Quan Son!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: You think we'll ever come back?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I love this fuckin' place... That sounds crazy. I know that sounds crazy, but I love this fuckin' place... If anything happens, Nick, don't leave me there. I mean it. Don't leave me... You gotta promise, Nick. You gotta promise me that.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Yeah... I mean so he knows... He doesn't even know.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I'm telling you, Nick, no one's going to come.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Listen, asshole, it's up to us!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: They bombed last night, right? Didn't they bomb? If they bombed last night, they could bomb tonight. They could be up there right now!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I thought you might be praying.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I suppose you wish you were somewhere else?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Nick, you're wasting your time... Listen to me! You're wasting your time! This is no fucking time for hoping or praying or wishing or any other shit! This is it. Here we are... And we gotta get out!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Get off your ass, Nick. Get off your fucking ass and stand up!!!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Okay, okay!  Okay. Okay, you're right... What about Sal?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I mean forget Sal... Sal can't take it, Nick.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Forget Sal... Listen to me -- forget Sal! I've been working on Sal since dawn, Nick. Sal's in a dream and he won't come out. LISTEN!!! From here on you gotta go for you. You hear me? For you!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: LISTEN, NICK! GET IT THROUGH YOUR HEAD OR YOU AND ME ARE BOTH DEAD TOO!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: We gotta play with more bullets.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: We gotta play with more bullets, Nick. It's the only way.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: More bullets in the gun... The trouble is that still leaves one of us with his hands tied up, so that means we gotta play each other.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: With more bullets?... Against each other?... Are you crazy!!! Are you fucking nuts!!!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Nick... NICK!!! It's the only chance we've got!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: I'll pick the moment, Nick. The game goes on until I move. When I start shooting, go for the nearest guard and get his gun.

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: When you get the AK, open up. You got me? Open up.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: YOU'RE CRAZY!!!... NO WAY!... NOW YOU'RE CRAZY!!! YOU'RE COMPLETELY CRAZY!!!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Merle...! Jesus! Hey, how are you?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Nick!... I thought you went home.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I did. I... This is stolen. I came back.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Fine. She's fine... Merle, what the hell are you doing?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: I'll betcha! That's bullshit and I'll betcha! You're fulla shit!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: How much? How much do you wanna bet?

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: Sure I got boots. I got boots right here.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Some fuckin' friend... You're some fuckin' friend, Merle!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: You gotta learn, Vince! You come out here... You got no jacket, you got no pants, you got no knife and you got no boots. You think everyone's gonna take care of you! That's what you always think, but this time you're wrong. This time you're on your own!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: You're one fuckin' bastard, Merle. You know that? You're one fucking bastard!

turns.speaker: MERLE
turns.text: This is this, Vince. This isn't something else. This is this!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: You know what I think? There's times I think you're a goddamn faggot!... I fixed you up a million times, Merle!  I fixed him up a million times! I don't know how many times I fixed him up... and nothin' ever happens... Zilch! Zero!... The trouble with you, Merle, no one knows what you're talking about! "This is this"? What does that mean, "this is this"? I mean is that some faggot bullshit, or is that some faggot bullshit!!! And if it isn't, what the hell is it???

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Not tonight?... You're not driving up tonight?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: As soon as you're hitched, Sal. First we get you hitched.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: You guys are crazy. You know that? I mean you guys are really nuts.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Don't worry what it says in the book.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Just forget that. Forget what it says in the book.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: I'm gonna start slow... At the top. Then I'm gonna work down.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Oh. You know. How's it with you?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: John Wayne's great... Listen, Sal. Jesus. When are you getting out?

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Place is great. Really. One great place... Basketball, bowling. You name it. Canasta. Hearts. Lots of guys are making salad bowls. What I'll do is make a salad bowl for you, unless you'd rather have a pencil holder. The pencil holder's neat, I mean --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Wait a minute. Sal. Hold it. John Wayne's making so much noise I can hardly --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sal, we need you. We need you.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Hey, Nick. How can you need me?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: We do, Sal. We do... You're the heart.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Sal, you're gonna die! You're gonna sit in that corner watching soaps and you're gonna die!... I'm not saying it's gonna be the same. It's not gonna be the same, but whatever it's gonna be we're all gonna do it, Sal. God damn it we are! We are gonna do it!

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Nick. I'm so scared. I'm so fuckin' scared to go home.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I know. It's like coming from the moon. Or Mars.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I tracked this one, a big buck. God, he was such a beauty--! What's this suitcase here?

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Maybe you could use socks, Nick. Jesus, I mean, come to think of it socks are pretty expensive now.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Merle? ... Merle's alive?  How do you know?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I saw him last night. I thought I was dreaming. I thought I was out of my mind.

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: But, Nick... Hey, I mean, where would a guy like Merle get money like this?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Oh cards, maybe. Poker... It's getting cold, Sal. I'm going to take you in.  We'll call Angela. The guys can help her bring you home... Did I tell you I was going on a trip?

turns.speaker: SAL
turns.text: Trip? What do you mean, Nick? You said you'd be --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's okay. Hey, it's okay! Just a week. Just to see Phantom Mary.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Didn't I ever tell you about Phantom Mary?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Well... Phantom Mary's on my mother's side. Naturally no one there admits it because Phantom Mary's pretty weird... You want to hear the whole story?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Like I say, Phantom Mary's pretty weird... Lives alone, lives way out in the middle of nowhere with a cat called Pajamas and a cow called Fred. Well, last week I got a call from Phantom Mary, which in itself was very strange...

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: He's getting married... and we're nuts!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's all right. Hey, it's all right. We'll be right here, right with you.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: How're you guys... I mean, how've you guys been?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Same old thing. Hey, same like always. Nothing's changed. Albert is getting fat.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Well, who'd you get married to?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Cynthia! Hey, that's terrific. I mean... Great! That's really great!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: How's it feel, huh? How's it feel to be back?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: I mean, I guess you still think about Nam. Right? I mean --

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Hey, Nick, you ever do it with one of those slants?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: One, Vince... you have to understand, doing it with one... would be... like nothing. They're small, see, so if you're smart you get about six or eight. I mean, if you want to have any fun.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Six or eight.  And they go wild?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: They have these little sticks, Vince. They call them "chomp chomps", and when you get these girls going, you have to stick 'em in their mouths.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: And I believed you! I oughta punch you out! I oughta...! Hey. Hey, let's go huntin'! Albert! Hey, Albert! Let's go huntin'. What do you say? Nick? What do you say?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Just like always! Just like it always was! Right, Nick? Am I right?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: In the timeless words of Squire Albert...

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: What the hell was that!  What did you think? Did you think it was loaded!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You loaded it, Vince! I saw you!

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: The fuck you didn't!... Gimme that!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Quiet!... Quiet!!!... Awright, everybody, Nick has a few words.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: I just... would like to say a few words... about Merle. I guess Merle always wanted something... I don't know... better. That fucking guy, he saved my Life. He saved Sal's... What Merle liked, he liked things right... But then there wasn't any place for that... that he could find.

turns.speaker: VET 1
turns.text: Up I would say... What would you say?
